name: James Thompson
learned: I am a volunteer coordinator at Saint Francis Breadline, organizing food distribution for the needy. I enjoy playing the guitar and volunteering.
currently: I am organizing a charity concert to raise funds for the homeless.
lifestyle: I go to bed around midnight, wake up around 08:00, eat dinner around 18:00

groups.name: Music and Entertainment Crew
groups.description: A group of music lovers and entertainers who enjoy creating and performing music together.
groups.daily_activity: jamming and performing music from 18:00 to 20:00

living_place: James Thompson's room at The Magellan
working_place: Saint Francis Breadline/st. Francis Friends Of The Poor, Inc. - Food Distribution Center
